channel.title: 华尔街日报
channel.description: 这是一个追踪华尔街日报news的种子

item.title: 乐评与之前的作品相比，MGMT 的第五张专辑《Loss of Life》充满了忧郁气息，呈现出一种更民谣、更朴素的美感。
item.description: Review: MGMT’s melancholy fifth album, "Loss of Life," features a folkier, more stripped-down aesthetic than that of its previous efforts on.wsj.com/3I726JX on.wsj.com/3I726JX

item.title: Planet Fitness 前首席执行官 Chris Rondeau 在公司裁员后辞去了该连锁健身房董事会的职务。
item.description: Former Planet Fitness Chief Executive Chris Rondeau has resigned from the gym-chain’s board after the company laid off a portion of its corporate workforce on.wsj.com/3T2K6GO on.wsj.com/3T2K6GO

item.title: 一位家居装饰大亨为其位于盖蒂中心旁、面积约 15,000 平方英尺的洛杉矶住宅开价 6,800 万美元。
item.description: A home-furnishings mogul is asking $68 million for his roughly 15,000-square-foot Los Angeles home next to the Getty Center on.wsj.com/3wqtm3D on.wsj.com/3wqtm3D

item.title: 亚马逊正式加入蓝筹股行列：周一开始交易时，亚马逊将取代沃尔格林博姿联盟（Walgreens Boots Alliance），被纳入著名的道琼斯工业平均指数（Dow Jones Industrial Average）。
item.description: Amazon is officially joining the blue chips: It will be included in the venerable Dow Jones Industrial Average at the start of trading Monday, replacing Walgreens Boots Alliance on.wsj.com/3SPcBXr on.wsj.com/3SPcBXr

item.title: 来自 @WSJopinion：今天的主流观点认为，乔-拜登和唐纳德-特朗普在乌克兰问题上是对立的。但 @wjmcgurn 写道：在未能阐明战略论点的问题上，两人是一丘之貉。
item.description: From @WSJopinion: The dominant narrative today holds that Joe Biden and Donald Trump are opposites on Ukraine. But when it comes to the failure to spell out a strategic argument, the two are one, writes @wjmcgurn. on.wsj.com/49lwSe6

item.title: 查尔斯-杜希格（Charles Duhigg）写道，成为一个能与任何人沟通的 "超级沟通者 "是一门科学，我们每个人都可以从中吸取经验教训。
item.description: There’s a science to becoming a “supercommunicator” who can connect with anyone, writes Charles Duhigg, and all of us can learn its lessons. on.wsj.com/3wpFge0 on.wsj.com/3wpFge0

item.title: 说到手机时尚，直角手机突然风靡一时
item.description: When it comes to cell phone fashions, right angles are suddenly all the rage on.wsj.com/3OP1yfs on.wsj.com/3OP1yfs

item.title: Zyn 是公众健康的福音还是对儿童的威胁？
item.description: Is Zyn a boon for public health or a threat to children? on.wsj.com/4bFnZ0v on.wsj.com/4bFnZ0v

item.title: 以色列军队正在扩建一条横穿加沙中部的道路，以方便其军事行动，这是其在一段时间内维持对飞地的安全控制计划的一部分。
item.description: The Israeli army is expanding a road across central Gaza to facilitate its military operations, part of its plans to maintain security control over the enclave for some time on.wsj.com/3UNHs9h on.wsj.com/3UNHs9h

item.title: 上周，酋长队超级碗集会上发生枪击事件，造成 43 岁的丽莎-洛佩兹-加尔万（Lisa Lopez-Galvan）死亡，另有 20 多人受伤，两名男子被控犯有谋杀罪。
item.description: Two men have been charged with murder in connection with a Chiefs Super Bowl rally shooting that killed 43-year-old Lisa Lopez-Galvan and wounded more than 20 others last week on.wsj.com/3ULcHle on.wsj.com/3ULcHle

item.title: 胡塞武装的持续袭击给拜登政府提出了新的问题，即如何制止袭击并防止加沙战争引发更多破坏地区稳定的冲突。
item.description: Persistent Houthi strikes are raising new questions for the Biden administration about how to halt the attacks and prevent the war in Gaza from fueling a more destabilizing regional conflict on.wsj.com/3SKLNYe on.wsj.com/3SKLNYe

item.title: 最高法院拒绝审理南卡罗来纳州港务局提起的诉讼，维持了下级法院要求查尔斯顿港在新集装箱码头使用全工会劳动力的裁决。
item.description: The Supreme Court declined to hear a case brought by South Carolina’s ports authority, letting stand a lower-court ruling that requires the Port of Charleston to use an all-union labor force at a new container terminal on.wsj.com/49Lasmt on.wsj.com/49Lasmt

item.title: FuboTV 起诉阻止 ESPN、华纳和福克斯计划推出的体育流媒体服务
item.description: FuboTV is suing to block a sports streaming service planned by ESPN, Warner and Fox on.wsj.com/3ORDiJP on.wsj.com/3ORDiJP

item.title: 来自 @WSJopinion：科技常常被恶语相向，说它毁了我们的青春，或可能导致人类灭绝。但更多的时候，它是一种向善的力量。@andykessler 写道，这就是其中的一个故事。
item.description: From @WSJopinion: Technology often gets bad-mouthed for ruining our youth or potentially causing the extinction of humanity. But more often than not, it’s a force for good. This is one of those stories, writes @andykessler. on.wsj.com/49oDKrg

item.title: 准备牛排的最佳方法是什么？五位屠夫分享了他们屡试不爽的步骤，包括如何购买、准备和烹制完美的肉类。
item.description: What is the best way to prepare a steak? Five butchers share their tried and true steps, including how to buy, prepare and cook your meat to perfection. on.wsj.com/3OUHlF5 on.wsj.com/3OUHlF5

item.title: Kaia Gerber 深知作为 nepo 宝宝的好处。"她说："我个人非常清楚这对我的好处，我绝不会说任何负面的话。
item.description: Kaia Gerber is aware of the benefits of being a nepo baby. “I personally am very aware of all the wonderful things it has done for me, and I would never ever say anything negative about it,” she says. on.wsj.com/4bLcqVG on.wsj.com/4bLcqVG

item.title: 我们毁了性爱吗？五位作家提出了一个问题：在人类最亲密的行为方面，社会是否已经迷失了方向？
item.description: Have we ruined sex? Five writers ask whether society has lost its way when it comes to the most intimate of human acts. on.wsj.com/3UMdpi4 on.wsj.com/3UMdpi4

item.title: 31 天不喝酒对您的健身目标到底有什么好处？我们请专家来解释一个月禁酒的好处。
item.description: What does no alcohol for 31 days actually do for your fitness goals? We asked experts to explain the benefits of a month of abstinence. on.wsj.com/3OOniIt on.wsj.com/3OOniIt

item.title: 上诉法院驳回了音乐出版商对考克斯通讯公司（Cox Communications）做出的价值 10 亿美元的判决，并下令重新审理这家互联网服务提供商因客户非法下载音乐而应承担的赔偿金额。
item.description: An appeals court dismissed a $1 billion verdict won by music publishers against Cox Communications, ordering a new trial on how much the internet provider should owe in damages for illegal downloads by its customers on.wsj.com/49me1PZ on.wsj.com/49me1PZ

item.title: 80 万美元能为你的退休生活带来什么？50 万美元呢？
item.description: What does $800,000 buy you in retirement? What about $500,000? on.wsj.com/3ONma7K on.wsj.com/3ONma7K

item.title: 保守派电台主持人戴夫-拉姆齐（Dave Ramsey）为年轻人提供了大量理财建议，但年轻人并不领情
item.description: Young adults are seeing a lot of financial-advice TikToks from conservative radio host Dave Ramsey, and they’re not having it on.wsj.com/3uQ2LMG on.wsj.com/3uQ2LMG

item.title: 希拉里-斯万克（Hilary Swank）仍然沿着洛杉矶的街道开车，她和她的母亲曾经在这条街上停车和睡觉。"尽管挑战重重，我还是怀念那些日子，我们一无所有"
item.description: Hilary Swank still drives along the L.A. street where she and her mom used to park and sleep. "Despite the challenges, I feel nostalgia for those days, when we had nothing." on.wsj.com/3T26aBo on.wsj.com/3T26aBo

item.title: 来自@WSJopinion：@gerardtbaker写道：美国右翼的很大一部分人积极拥抱道德等价交换，而这曾是自暴自弃的左翼精英的显著特征。
item.description: From @WSJopinion: A large part of the American right actively embraces the moral equivalence that used to be a defining feature of self-loathing left-wing elites, writes @gerardtbaker on.wsj.com/48qI5c1

item.title: 皇马从 14 岁起就开始追逐姆巴佩。西班牙俱乐部似乎终于找到了自己的目标。
item.description: Real Madrid has been chasing Kylian Mbappé since he was 14 years old. The Spanish club finally appears to have its man. on.wsj.com/48oNhx7 on.wsj.com/48oNhx7

item.title: 最高法院驳回了一起寻求阻止选择性公立学校使用种族中立招生政策的案件，保守派活动人士认为这些政策旨在非法增加黑人和西班牙裔学生的入学率
item.description: The Supreme Court turned down a case seeking to block selective public schools from using race-neutral admissions policies that conservative activists argue are illegally designed to increase Black and Hispanic enrollment on.wsj.com/3T0ZVhf on.wsj.com/3T0ZVhf

item.title: 雷切尔-戈德堡-波林（Rachel Goldberg-Polin）的儿子赫什（Hersh）于 10 月 7 日被绑架，此后家人一直没有他的消息。她成了释放人质的倡导者"我需要我的儿子"
item.description:
Rachel Goldberg-Polin’s son, Hersh, was kidnapped on Oct. 7 and his family has had no word of him since. She's become an advocate for the release of hostages. "I need my son." on.wsj.com/3I7behK

on.wsj.com/3I7behK

item.title: 有那么几天，厄瓜多尔似乎在帮助西方对抗莫斯科对乌克兰的入侵时，站在了一个更大的国家--俄罗斯的对立面。随后，俄罗斯停止购买厄瓜多尔最重要的出口产品之一--香蕉。
item.description: For a few days, it seemed that Ecuador would stand up to a much bigger country, Russia, in helping the West fight Moscow’s invasion of Ukraine. Then Russia stopped buying some of Ecuador’s bananas, one of its most important exports. on.wsj.com/3T5kgC3 on.wsj.com/3T5kgC3

item.title: 拜登总统的竞选连任活动表示，上个月筹集到了 4,200 多万美元，继续保持强劲的筹款势头，因为他和前总统唐纳德-特朗普越来越有可能在 11 月对决。
item.description: President Biden’s re-election effort said that it raised more than $42 million last month, continuing a strong fundraising streak as he and former President Donald Trump are increasingly likely to face each other in November on.wsj.com/42NvFdd on.wsj.com/42NvFdd

item.title: 美国航空公司现在将对国内航班在机场托运行李收取 40 美元的费用，或对提前在线支付的旅客收取 35 美元的费用。
item.description: American Airlines will now charge $40 to check a bag at the airport for domestic flights or $35 for those who pay in advance online on.wsj.com/3SOiVOC on.wsj.com/3SOiVOC

item.title: 在过去的一年里，沙特阿拉伯一直是华而不实的支出计划的传送带--而这一切都变得相当昂贵
item.description:
Saudi Arabia has been a conveyor belt of flashy spending plans over the past year—and it’s all getting rather expensive on.wsj.com/48lTV7m

on.wsj.com/48lTV7m
